theFleshweaver:LethalityPower.NAME: Lethality
DESCRIPTIONS: Affects the efficiency of damaging attacks.

theFleshweaver:LoseLethalityPower.NAME: Lose Lethality
DESCRIPTIONS: #yLethality at the end of your turn.

theFleshweaver:ThaumaturgyPower.NAME: Thaumaturgy
DESCRIPTIONS: Affects the efficiency of your spellcasting.

theFleshweaver:LoseThaumaturgyPower.NAME: Lose Thaumaturgy
DESCRIPTIONS: #yThaumaturgy at the end of your turn.

theFleshweaver:VitalityPower.NAME: Lose Vitality
DESCRIPTIONS: Affects the efficiency of defensive abilities.

theFleshweaver:LoseVitalityPower.NAME: Vitality
DESCRIPTIONS: #yVitality at the end of your turn.

theFleshweaver:InfectedVeinsPower.NAME: Infected Veins
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 Card each time you gain #b1 #yMagical #yRot.

theFleshweaver:HaloOfThornsPower.NAME: Halo Of Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: Block each time you #yChannel 1 Thorn Volley.

theFleshweaver:MagicalRotPower.NAME: Magical Rot
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage at the end of your Turn to EVERYONE.
